properties.areaDesc: Outer Saginaw Bay SW of Alabaster to Port Austin MI to Inner Saginaw Bay; Lake Huron from Port Austin to Harbor Beach 5NM Off Shore to the US/Canadian border; Port Austin to Harbor Beach MI; Inner Saginaw Bay SW of Point Au Gres to Bay Port MI; Lake Huron from Sturgeon Point to Alabaster MI 5NM off shore to US/Canadian border
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 10 at 4:12PM EST until January 12 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Expect sustained winds up to 33 knots from the
northeast with gusts up to 47 knots. The largest significant
waves will be 16 feet with a potential maximum wave height of
23 feet.

* WHERE...Central Lake Huron and Saginaw Bay.

* WHEN...The maximum winds are expected around 8 PM EST Saturday
with the largest waves expected around 9 PM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wintry mix of precipitation and freezing
spray will also be around Saturday and Saturday night.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM SATURDAY TO 11 AM EST SUNDAY
